name: ALLY Solutions

idea:
This startup idea incubated when I myself became a mother and my journey started.  As I walked upon the path I kept buying new things , baby gears , toys rapidly as my baby was out growing many things.

I always wondered what to do with baby gears which I have safely wrapped and kept it in the storage ,what will I do with the little toys which I bought with so much love once your baby grows up ? I have many such thing of my child and have always thought of the same , but my apprehension is to give it to someone who needs them and will use with same live and affection as I did..

Such baby stuff like pram, cot, bouncers , cycles , high chairs, rattles , are used till some age by our baby , post which it becomes another item to keep safely.


And here we are , based on my experience in the past , I came across this idea of  “used with love” to sell our baby/child products to other mothers. 

Mothers looking to offer their used with love belongings and mothers looking to obtain, will be connected on the app/website, where they can interact with fellow mothers
name: Used With Love

name: CLASSIC HEALTHCARE LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Wasan E-Mobility Solutions Private Limited an electric vehicle manufacturing start up founded by serial automobile entrepreneurs Mr Taarun Vijay Waasan and Mr V K Wasan of Wasan Group. Also known by “WeMobility”.

WeMobility is based out of Mumbai. Presently the company is at ideation stage. Company at the starting focusing on manufacturing of “e-rickshaw” and “e-kart” with unique propositions like,

1. Advanced lithium-ion battery with long life and quick charging as simple as charging a smartphone.

2. Longer Driving Range in one Full Charge – minimise operating cost

3. Comfortable and best in class cabin space

Our goal is to provide great quality electric transportation at an affordable price. Our WeMobility electric 3 wheelers will be equipped with high quality power train drive technology along with driver ergonomics and user friendly handling. With the price of Petrol rising and urban areas becoming more populated, people are turning to alternative methods of transportation. Our WeMobility e-3 wheelers will be the perfect option for logistics segment first & last mile transport. We are here with a vibrant product for faster & easy adoption of EVs.
name: WASAN E-MOBILITY SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
